```
public String stringConcatenation() {
    return "Get busy living"
            .concat(newLine)
            .concat("or")
            .concat(newLine)
            .concat("get busy dying.")
            .concat(newLine)
            .concat("--Stephen King");
}
```

```
public String stringConcatenation() {
    return "Get busy living"
            + newLine
            + "or"
            + newLine
            + "get busy dying."
            + newLine
            + "--Stephen King";
}
```
